job_description:
Company: FrontierTech
Position: Product Manager
Location: New York, NY
Salary: $120,000 - $160,000

About Us:
FrontierTech is developing innovative products. We combine cutting-edge technology. We focus on making our customers leaders in their fields.

Job Description:
Our product manager will define product vision, strategy, and roadmaps. Interact with customers to gather requirements. Work with engineering on specifications and scheduling.

Responsibilities:
- Define and communicate product vision and strategy.
- Gather and prioritize product requirements.
- Work with engineering to develop product specifications and schedules.
- Manage the product backlog and prioritize features.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 3+ years of experience in product management.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Agile development methodologies.
- Knowledge of software development processes.
- Technical background.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunity to shape the future of our products.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.
- Professional development opportunities.
